Method.name: SortListOfObjects
Method.Description: Sorts a list of objects on one of it's properties. Sort is stable, objects with the same sort key stay in the same order.

Method.name: ParseSortSpec
Method.Description:
Convert a string sort specification into the internal %List version, filling in defaults for missing properties.
The full sort specification is a comma-separated list of sort specification items. Items contain the following information (separated by colons): - Value: the name of a property to sort on - Direction: "A" (ascending, default) or "D" (descending) - Default: a default value to use if the property value is empty.
If errors are detected in the specification, an error status is returned.
